Destiny Church highway convoy: Police furious at Brian Tamaki-organised group’s ‘reckless, unlawful, irresponsible’ conduct https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/destiny-church-highway-convoy-police-furious-at-brian-tamaki-organized-groups-reckless-unlawful-irresponsible-conduct/RIAUARLAAJGXJJY4WXKHPUXQ3Y/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/destiny-church-highway-convoy-police-furious-at-brian-tamaki-organized-groups-reckless-unlawful-irresponsible-conduct/RIAUARLAAJGXJJY4WXKHPUXQ3Y/ Cherie Howie, Vaimoana MasePolice say thousands of people were affected by today's convoy. Sat, 16 Nov 2024 04:53:48 +0000 A convoy organised by Destiny Church leader Brian Tamaki to protest the flying of flags other than New Zealand's official ensign stopped traffic on State Highway 1 near Bombay to perform a haka.
